title: Synchronous Online Learning-Based Language Project Competency Development Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language proficiency and experience using online learning tools
context.additional_context: Digital devices (tablets/laptops) provided per learner, with real-time collaboration via Microsoft Teams or Zoom, culminating in a comprehensive final evaluation.

learning_goals: Learners can collaboratively complete language project outcomes on synchronous online platforms
Learners improve language expression accuracy and fluency by more than 20% through real-time interaction
Learners maintain learning engagement at over 80% using interactive multimedia tools in online environments
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
